Texts.Eng: Ah, I see you got the <item> - I expect it was SO difficult to get <target> to hand it over. Keep hold of it for me for the time being, will you?
Texts.Rus: А, я вижу что ты достал<player.pronoun.verbEnding> <item>. Я ожидал<questGiver.pronoun.verbEnding>, что будет довольно тяжело заставить <target> отдать это. Подержи <item> пока у себя, ладно?

Texts.Eng: Ah, you got <target>'s <item>. I imagine the look on <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> face was priceless!
Texts.Rus: А, ты сумел<player.pronoun.verbEnding> достать <item>. Представляю, что выражение <target.pronoun.reflexive> лица было бесценным!

Texts.Eng: First I need you to ^green;find that fool, ^orange;<target> ^green;and ask <target.pronoun.object> to give up <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> ^orange;<item>. ^white;Make sure you mention that ^orange;<questGiver>^white; sent you, <target.pronoun.subject> won't protest...
Texts.Rus: Сперва, мне надо, чтобы ты ^green;отыскал<player.pronoun.verbEnding> этого дурака по имени ^orange;<target> и попросил<player.pronoun.verbEnding> отдать <target.pronoun.reflexive> ^orange<item>. ^white;Убедись, что упомянешь, кто тебя послал. <target.pronoun.capitalSubject> не будет сопротивляться...

Texts.Eng: First, we must deal with ^orange;<target>. ^white;I need <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> ^orange;<item>, ^white;but <target.pronoun.subject>'d be petrified if I went in person. It would save us both some trouble if you were to ^green;fetch it^white; instead.
Texts.Rus: Сначала мы должны разобраться с личностью по имени ^orange;<target>. ^white;Мне кое-что нужно от <target.pronoun.reflexive>, но <target.pronoun.subject> был<target.pronoun.verbEnding> бы ужасе, если бы я отправил<questGiver.pronoun.verb3Ending> туда лично. Будет намного спокойнее, если отправишься ты, и ^green;заберешь то что мне нужно^white;.

Texts.Eng: Good job collecting our <item>! I knew <target> would be useful to keep around...
Texts.Rus: Хорошая работа! Я так и знал<questGiver.pronoun.verbEnding>, что будет полезно оставить <target.pronoun.reflexive> в живых.

Texts.Eng: Great! Floran knew <target> wouldn't put up a fight. Thisss <item> will do nicely.
Texts.Rus: Здорово! Флоран знал, что <target> не устроит драку. Этот <item> вполне подойдёт.

Texts.Eng: Having a good ^orange;<item> ^white;is necessary for our plan. I'm pretty sure ^orange;<target>^white; has one, so why don't you ^green;go and collect it? ^white;Don't worry, <target.pronoun.subject> wouldn't dare disobey...
Texts.Rus: Иметь при себе ^orange;<item> ^white;просто необходимо для нашего плана. Я определённо уверен<questGiver.pronoun.verbEnding>, что ^orange;<target>^white; имеет это, так почему бы тебе не ^green;пойти и забрать? ^white;Не беспокойся, <target.pronoun.subject> не посмеет возразить...

Texts.Eng: Ms Extorted

Next step requiress some muscle. Floran knows ^orange;<target>^white; is cowering somewhere. ^green;Go tell <target.pronoun.object> Floran thinks <target.pronoun.subject> should "volunteer" <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> ^orange;<item>.

Next, we need one ^orange;<item>^white;. ^orange;<target>^white; will have one. <target.pronoun.capitalSubject> should ^green;give it up without a fight if you tell <target.pronoun.object> I sent you^white;.

Now we can have a bit of fun! Go find ^orange;<target> ^white;and ^green;pressure <target.pronoun.object> into handing over <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> ^orange;<item>.^white; It shouldn't be too difficult, just mention that ^orange;<questGiver>^white; sent you.

Okay, first there is sssomething we need, and Floran knows just the person to get it. ^green;Find ^orange;<target>^green; and tell <target.pronoun.object> to give <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> ^orange;<item>^green; up^white;, or Floran will deal with <target.pronoun.object> persssonally!
Perfect. I knew <target> wouldn't dare kick up a fuss.
See? Sometimesss the easiest way to get something done is to apply a little presssure.

Texts.Eng: Step one, ^green;we need to get ^orange;<item>^white;. Floran knows that ^orange;<target>^white; hasss one. ^green;Make <target.pronoun.object> hand it over^white;, Floran knows <target.pronoun.subject>'sss pitiful and won't protest.
This <item> is perfect! You've done well.
This is the perfect <item>. I suppose <target> wasn't too much trouble?

To begin with we need to find ourselves a good ^orange;<item>. ^white;I happen to know that ^orange;<target> ^white;has got one, so you could ^green;pick it up directly from <target.pronoun.object>.^white; <target.pronoun.capitalSubject> already knows <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> place, so <target.pronoun.subject> wouldn't dare to disobey me.

We have to collect one ^orange;<item>^white; from somewhere. I believe ^orange;<target>^white; has one, and <target.pronoun.subject> just so happens to owe me a favour. Will you ^green;pick up the ^orange;<item>^green; from <target.pronoun.object>?
We need one ^orange;<item>^white; next. ^green;Take one from ^orange;<target>^white; - <target.pronoun.subject>'s such a scaredy-cat <target.pronoun.subject>'d do whatever Floran wantss.

We need to get our hands on one ^orange;<item>.^white; Luckily, ^orange;<target>^white; who lives nearby ^green;should have one.^white; Even better, <target.pronoun.subject> already knows who's the boss around here, so I know ^green;<target.pronoun.subject>'ll oblige you^white;.
Well done! This <item> will come in handy to us very soon.

Texts.Eng: You got it! Easy, right? Floran would've liked to sssee <target>'s face! Floran betsss <target.pronoun.subject> was shaking in <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> boots!
